Posts.Content: suzeyqhere wrote: I had stage 3A breast cancer in 1992...underwent a mastectomy, 10 mo of chemo and 6 wks of radiation. I  have been cancer free ever since.  I have recently asked for my medical records and learned that my cancer was PR/ER positive....and have been told that when it is positive that the chances of it coming back in 15-20 years are greater....can anyone shed light on this for me? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: PR/ER receptor suzeyqhere LRM216
